story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_0100_10:
They have a way to save the future right in front
of them!
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_0200_10: Why are they dragging their feet?!
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I must provide limitless energy to ensure
everlasting prosperity for everyone...
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_0400_10: It is my purpose, my duty, my destiny!
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I need to do something as soon as possible—for
our future!
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_0600_10: Even if I become hated for it.
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_0800_10: I can see you are a man of remarkable caliber.
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_1000_10: Just like you, I also lead an organization.
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_1100_10: I know a way to extract sync stones’ power.
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_1200_10:
But I can’t seem to find a better way to use
that power...
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_1300_10: So, how about it? Interested in working together?
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I don’t think it’s a good idea to listen to this
suspicious man, Mr. Rose.
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_1500_10: It doesn’t matter who he is, Oleana.
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_1600_10:
If we’re to protect the future, we can’t be picky
about our methods.
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I must gain management over all sync stones,
even if I have to be somewhat aggressive.
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_2000_10:
To do that, you’d need to own Pasio—the only
place where you can find these sync stones.
story_galar_01_07000/2401_1001_2300_10:
For the time being, let’s not share this with your
acquaintances from Galar...
